Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies face the Marlins with a 2-1 series lead.
The Marlins are 38-17 in games when they have more hits than their opponents.
The Phillies have the third-ranked team batting average in the NL at.260.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The matchup Sunday is the 13th meeting between these teams this season.
The Phillies have a 7-5 advantage in the season series.
Others: Jake Burger leads Miami with 25 home runs while slugging.459.
Derek Hill is 6-for-34 with three home runs and six RBI over the last 10 games.
Kyle Schwarber has 20 doubles and 33 home runs for the Phillies.
Bryce Harper is 12-for-35 with four doubles over the last 10 games.
The Phillies are 7-3 over their last 10 games with a.271 batting average and 4.15 ERA.
The Marlins are 5-5 over their last 10 games with a.251 batting average and 5.66 ERA.
